data.title: of Thuringia, Elizabeth
meta_keywords: vulgarisation scientifique reflexions article université liège belgique source savoir segi connaissance
data.meta_description:
Source de Savoirs,

Born in 1207, died 1231. Elizabeth of Thuringia was the daughter of King Andrew II of Hungary. She married Louis IV of Thuringia, but became an early adherent of the movement begun by St. Francis of Assisi in Italy. Known for her piety and the help she brought to others, she was canonized in 1235.
data.text: Born in 1207, died 1231. Elizabeth of Thuringia was the daughter of King Andrew II of Hungary. She married Louis IV of Thuringia, but became an early adherent of the movement begun by St. Francis of Assisi in Italy. Known for her piety and the help she brought to others, she was canonized in 1235.
